name: news_search
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool webull.
Tool description: Query public data for investment products including stocks, fractional shares, options, ETFs, and ADRs as on webull.com
API description: Search for news articles that match a given keyword.

keyword.description: The term or phrase to search for in news articles.

pageindex.description: The index of the page to retrieve. Default is 1.

pagesize.description: The number of results per page. Maximum is 20. Default is 20.
